text: Margo Stilley (born November 20, 1982) is an American actress. She is known for her role as Lisa in the 2004 British romantic drama movie 9 Songs. She also appeared in How to Lose Friends & Alienate People (2008), Marple: Murder Is Easy (2009), Hippie Hippie Shake (2009), The Trip (2010), and The Royals (2016). Stilley was born in Conway, South Carolina, and grew up between there and Swansboro, North Carolina. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1982 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:Actors from South Carolina Category:Actors from North Carolina
title: Margo Stilley
